name: Cauldron Caverns
description:
Welcome to Cauldron Caverns, the long known location of a bat sanctuary. Once there was a thriving bat population deep inside the caves, but a few decades ago the bats abandoned it. Researchers have been investigating the mass exodus but they have recently seen evidence of bat activity around and inside the cave. Could the population be returning?

Collect fireflies on your flights for upgrades!

CONTROLS:

The bat will follow your mouse, move it around to direct the bat.

CREDITS:

Jeff Minbiole - Design, Programmer, Music/SFX
